name: BBB: Boost Boom Boots
description:
Click on the game to get the focus. Controls

SPACE BAR/ LEFT CLICK : jump

R : restart the game

How to play

Gain points by :

  • Picking the green floppy disk.
  • Destroying  the green ads by jumping on it.
  • Pick the purple boost to gain more point but with a speed increase (harder).

Each time you increase your combo, but you loose it when hitting an obstacle!

Score Sheet

Floppy Disk : 1 point

Advertising sign : 10 points

Purple Boost : 100 points
